trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible scopes for a directory search that is performed using the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher" /> 개체를 사용하여 수행되는 디렉터리 검색의 가능한 범위를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Limits the search to the base object.
The result contains a maximum of one object.

When the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.AttributeScopeQuery" /> property is specified for a search, the scope of the search must be set to <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope.Base" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.AttributeScopeQuery" /> 속성이 검색에 지정되어 있으면 검색 범위가 <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope.Base" />로 설정되어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Searches the immediate child objects of the base object, excluding the base object.
trans-unit.target: 기본 개체를 제외하고 기본 개체의 직접 자식 개체를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: Searches the whole subtree, including the base object and all its child objects.
trans-unit.target: 기본 개체와 해당하는 모든 자식 개체를 포함한 전체 하위 트리를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the scope of a directory search is not specified, a <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope.Subtree" /> type of search is performed.
trans-unit.target: 디렉터리 검색 범위가 지정되지 않으면 <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope.Subtree" /> 형식의 검색이 수행됩니다.
